Package weka.classifiers.mi.miti

Interface Summary
IBestSplitMeasure Interface to be implemented by split selection measures.
SufficientStatistics Interface to be implemented by classes that maintain sufficient statistics.
 

Class Summary
AlgorithmConfiguration Stores parameters that determine the configuration of the algorithm.
Bag Class for maintaining a bag of instances, including its ID and whether it's enabled.
BEPP Class with static methods for calculating BEPP score.
Gini Implements the Gini-based split selection measure.
MaxBEPP Implements the MaxBEPP split selection measure.
NextSplitHeuristic Implements the node selection heuristic.
Split Represents a split in the decision tree.
SSBEPP Implements the SSBEPP split selection measure.
SufficientBagStatistics Class that maintains sufficient statistics at the bag level.
SufficientInstanceStatistics Class that maintains sufficient statistics at the instance level.
TreeNode Represents a node in the decision tree.
